abstract: Newer digital music services like Spotify have made news this year, but 10-year-old Rhapsody just passed a significant milestone of its own.
snippet: Newer digital music services like Spotify have made news this year, but 10-year-old Rhapsody just passed a significant milestone of its own.
lead_paragraph: Digital services like Spotify that stream millions of songs by subscription have made some of the music industry’s biggest news this year. Facebook and taste makers like Rolling Stone have embraced these services as the future of music listening, while artists and record companies have fretted about whether they hurt download sales.

headline.main: Rhapsody, Veteran Streamer of Music, Reaches a Million Subscribers
